value.stringValue: No Credit Score found on the Main Borrowing Relationship. Please fill in the Credit Score and re-run the Decision Engine
Please submit this loan for approval in order to request a manual review of the details.
The loan amount is larger than allowed for the Loan Auto-Decision process.

formulas.name: Description_Approved
formulas.expression: {!Loan.Name} & " has completed decisioning and is approved. Review all the details here and 'submit for approval' to continue with the auto approval process."

formulas.name: Description_Decline
formulas.expression: {!Loan.Name} & " has completed decisioning and is declined. To continue with the adverse actions process, review all the details here and select the 'Adverse Actions' button."

formulas.name: Description_Manual_Review_Required
formulas.expression: {!Loan.Name} & " could not be auto decisioned and requires a manual review. You can view all of the captured detail here."

formulas.name: Description_Recommend_Approval
formulas.expression: {!Loan.Name} & " has completed decisioning and is approved. Navigate to the Offers route next to see what great deals to present!"

formulas.name: Description_Recommend_Decline
formulas.expression: {!Loan.Name} & " has completed decisioning and is recommended for decline. To continue to the adverse actions process, review all the details here and select the “Adverse Actions” button."

recordUpdates.description: Updates the Loan Stage to Underwriting
recordUpdates.name: Update_Loan_Stage_Underwriting
recordUpdates.label: Update Loan Stage Underwriting

recordUpdates.description: Updates the Loan Stage to Underwriting
recordUpdates.name: Update_Loan_Stage_Underwriting_Decline
recordUpdates.label: Update Loan Stage Underwriting Decline
